label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_008
content:
## 2024-04-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 92
- Active: 90
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 22
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment by Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 28
- Standard: 31
- Placebo: 33

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.7
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 38.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.4
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 308.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 49.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.5
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.3
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.9
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.9

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.2
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 45.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 286.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 45.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.5
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.9
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.6

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.8
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.9
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.6
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 265.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 33.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.2
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.8
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.0

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 182
- Sessions Attended: 156
- Attendance Rate (%): 87.6

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 12.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (k) Mean: 6.0
- WBC (k) SD: 1.4
- Platelets (k) Mean: 253
- Platelets (k) SD: 41
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.8
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.12
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 103.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 15.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 9.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0823, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0831, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0840, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0872, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-0834, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block
- Site 04 monitoring visit completed, 2 findings
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 21 sites

### Notes
- Week 8: Pain management assessments on track. 92 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
